content: Is there a variant of #check that checks if expression does not type check? My use case it to check that certain typeclass does not get inferred. So there might be a different way to achieve this, but ensuring failure of typechecking should do it.
Amazing error message Unexpected success :joy: ... thanks does exactly what I need. I was trying #fail #error ...
Tomas Skrivan has marked this topic as resolved.
